interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Prairie Rose Organics Cocoa Butter Cream Peppermint Body Butter - Mint Cocoa Whipped Body Cream
Review Date: 2021/12/05
Store: Prairie Rose Organics
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Prairie Rose Organics', 'Scent': 'Mint,Peppermint', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '8.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '4.21 x 4.21 x 3.15 inches; 10.23 Ounces', 'UPC': '617270048740'}
Review Text: This smells just like a peppermint mocha beverage. However, the kind of strong fragrance lessens  rather fast. After application my skin tingles from the mint for about 10 minutes. This is a lightweight moisturizer and it sinks in rather quickly. The cream is housed in a jar so you need to dig your fingers in to get the product. Not my favorite delivery system because it gets under my nails. As a long time body moisturizer user I think this is a terrific gift.
Review Title: Fragrance is true to description
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Osensia Silver Conditioner for Brassy Hair - Toning Purple Conditioner - Paraben Free Blonde Treatment for Highlights, Platinum, Bleached, and Gray Hair - Grape Seed Hydrates and Brightens Color
Osensia
{'Brand': 'Osensia', 'Item Form': 'conditioner', 'Material Feature': 'Paraben Free', 'Hair Type': 'Oily, Color Treated, bleached, Dry, Normal', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.5 x 2.2 x 2.2 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '039853185725'}
My hair is professionally colored monthly and I still have problems with oxidation resulting in brassiness. I began using this conditioner shortly after my hair was colored in November and I just went for a touch up and got feed back from my stylist. While I thought the color had less brassiness I wanted her professional opinion. Without prompting she said my hair looked great (except for the roots) and asked what I had been doing different. The silver conditioner was my response. My husband, who is totally white haired also has been using the conditioner once per week. To keep the yellow out of his hair he shampoos and conditions purple once a week and this has been a positive addition to his routine. Be careful not to over use this product because the results will be undesirable.
Reduces Oxidation and Brassiness
Replacement Toothbrush Heads Compatible With Oral B Braun Electric Toothbrush, 4 Count
HDY
{'Brand': 'HDY', 'Size': '4 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Item Firmness Description': 'Extra Soft', 'Number of Pieces': '4', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.43 x 0.39 x 2.76 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '632088377561', 'Manufacturer': 'HDY'}
After buying name brand toothbrushes for years I was skeptical to try an off brand. So far both my husband and I are impressed with the quality of these brushes. They are firmer than the name brand brush but that is good because the brand brushes splay out the bristles long before the 3 month recommended change time. He tried this brush first and commented that his teeth felt so much cleaner, when I brushed later I agreed with his reaction. These come 4 in a package with color rings attached. The brushes are not individually wrapped so the extras went into a plastic bag for clean storage.
Terrific Value
FAELBATY 2 Pack Shower Caps for Women Waterproof and Reusable Elastic Printed Shower Cap Beauty Salon Spa Shower Caps (leopard)
FAELBATY
{'Brand': 'FAELBATY', 'Material': 'Ethylene Vinyl Acetate (EVA)', 'Pattern': 'Leopard', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Number of Pieces': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '8.9 x 6.65 x 1.06 inches; 1.41 Ounces'}
Personally I like this shower cap better than a more expensive one I already had. It comes flat so if you plan to travel with it it is a good choice. I like it because it is not so bouffant that it gets wet and then drips down my back as I am toweling off. It dries fast too. This fits my average size head without drooping on to my forehead during a shower.
Folds Flat
MOSTORY Glitter Crystal Liquid Eyeshadow Set - 4 Pack Pigmented Liquid Eye shadows Matte Shimmer Metallic Quick Dry Crease Resistant Long Lasting Flake-Proof Blendable Non-Greasy Eye Makeup (4 Pack)
MOSTORY
{'Brand': 'MOSTORY', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Special Feature': 'Long last, Crease proof, Blendable', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting', 'Package Dimensions': '4.84 x 4.49 x 0.87 inches; 5.11 Ounces'}
Four glittering shades of eye shadow make up this affordable set. The applicator is easy to use and the product goes on smoothly and stays on for hours. For special events or if you are a dramatic personality these shadows will have you rocking the look.  These shadows scream creativity and fun. As an accent for a more discreet look or a full blown lid cover these are the glittery choice to make.
Beautiful Shades
Topwon 4.5Inch Makeup Remover Pads Washable Cotton Face Cleansing Pad for Sensitive Skin 3 Packs Facial Washing Puffs to Remove Mascara Foundation Lipstick
Topwon
['Make up removal pads are easily exfoliating and remove all makeup, creams, sunscreen & cosmetics when wet.It can be facial makeup cleansing towel, eye makeup remover cloths, foundation make-up remover wipes, lipstick removing cleaning puff. Compact size is easy for travel or camping A ecofriendly makeup removing solution for you and the environment Makeup removal pads and facial cleaning puffs Cotton fleece washing face cloth pad with inner sponge Perfect for washing with only water or facial cleanser to help people cleaning face, makeup remove Washable pad we recommend wash with soap each time after use Size: 4.5Inch*0.8Inch,Please choose your order quantity']
{'Brand': 'Topwon', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable', 'Unit Count': '3.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '3', 'Package Dimensions': '6.37 x 5.51 x 2.44 inches; 0.95 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'HHA1104', 'Manufacturer': 'Topwon'}
I love these little disk pads for face cleaning. These are a pretty pink and are so soft.  For makeup removal with no cleanser they cleaned my face and removed a lot of eye makeup but not all of it. I am removing eye makeup with cotton pads but face makeup can be totally removed with this little pad. These are softer than washcloths and feel great. I washed them with my towels and they came out perfect.
Soft
Birthday Gift, Yachyee hair removal device
Yachyee
["What's in Yachyee Relaxing Gifts for Women:", '--- 12 oz Rose Gold insulated stainless steel tumbler with a reusable straw and cleaning brush, with the words ""Beauty begins the moment you love yourself"". --- Flower Petal Bath Bombs, drop them into the tub to relax among the delicate aromas of vanilla and lavender petals. --- Scented Candle, made of 100% soy wax, luxurious and all-natural, can immediately turn your space into a little serene and peaceful flower garden. --- Rose Bar Soap, made with natural flower essential oil to bring you to a dreamland of lavender cloud. --- Beautiful Key Bottle Opener and heart shape Wine Bottle Stopper --- Greeting Card, you can write your special blessing to her. 🎈 DON\'T FORGET TO SELECT ""THIS ORDER CONTAINS A GIFT"" AT CHECKOUT TO ADD YOUR FREE PERSONALIZED MESSAGE THROUGH AMAZON.🎈 50th 60th 40th birthday gifts for women 30th birthday gifts for her get well soon gift basket gifts for women gift basket for women self care gifts for women sister birthday gifts from sister']
{'Item Form': 'Variety', 'Material Feature': 'Organic Ingredients, Vegan', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Yachyee', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Product Dimensions': '7.7 x 6.8 x 3.5 inches; 12 Ounces', 'UPC': '697478889727', 'Manufacturer': 'Yachyee'}
The sentiment on the tumbler sets the tone for this gift box. "Beauty begins the moment you love yourself" is artistically written in alternating script and uppercase print on the dishwasher safe tumbler. The lid is plastic with a shuffle opening. The gift box includes a reusable straw and a small brush for cleaning. A wine plug with a heart on top is thoughtfully provided too. Two nice size bath bombs alsopopulate the arrangement. A single wick scented candle is a nice size for a bathroom and it adds fragrance without being overpowering. A square rose soap wrapped in cellophane finishes the presentation. This all comes in a gift box with a pretty "Best Wishes" enclosure card with a blank inside to write a few words of your own. I like that the fragrance is not overpowering when the box is opened, as each scented item is unwrapped you can experience the pleasant aroma of the product. The inside cover of the box says "Be Happy Forever." The outside of the box has the company name followed by Thinking of you. This is a perfect generic gift ready to affirm someone who needs it or to celebrate an occasion.
Impressive Gift
Prairie Rose Organics Cocoa Butter Cream Peppermint Body Butter - Mint Cocoa Whipped Body Cream
Prairie Rose Organics
{'Brand': 'Prairie Rose Organics', 'Scent': 'Mint,Peppermint', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '8.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '4.21 x 4.21 x 3.15 inches; 10.23 Ounces', 'UPC': '617270048740'}
This smells just like a peppermint mocha beverage. However, the kind of strong fragrance lessens  rather fast. After application my skin tingles from the mint for about 10 minutes. This is a lightweight moisturizer and it sinks in rather quickly. The cream is housed in a jar so you need to dig your fingers in to get the product. Not my favorite delivery system because it gets under my nails. As a long time body moisturizer user I think this is a terrific gift.
Fragrance is true to description
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Care Focus**: Continues to prioritize products addressing brassiness in color-treated hair, integrating specialized conditioners and targeted treatments to combat oxidation.

- **Product Preference**: Emphasizes health-conscious choices, favoring paraben-free formulas and effective toning agents. Open to off-brand products maintaining quality standards, showcasing versatility and a recent interest in eco-friendly solutions. Recently explored lightweight and scented body moisturizers, appreciating both their scent and experience of use.

- **Oral Care Interest**: Maintains a strong preference for high-quality oral care products, highlighting superior cleaning in toothbrush heads and a routine of regular replacements for optimal hygiene.

- **Makeup Preferences**: Recently demonstrated an interest in creative makeup options and effective removal techniques, favoring practical, reusable items. This reflects a balance of practicality and aesthetics in her routine.

- **Gift-Giving Approach**: Expresses affection through thoughtful gift selections, reflecting a focus on self-care and wellness, enhanced by personal touches in presentation. Shows a trend towards considering fragrant and unique gifts that enhance the experience of self-care.

- **Routine & Usage**: Incorporates consistent hair maintenance and engages family in product experiences, illustrating a trend toward family-oriented personal care.

- **Feedback-Oriented**: Values professional validation and seeks stylist input for product effectiveness while relying on spousal feedback, emphasizing collaborative decision-making.

- **Caution with Usage**: Demonstrates awareness of product application guidelines to prevent adverse effects, reflecting a conscientious approach to personal care.

Overall, the user balances health-conscious personal care with a commitment to quality, creativity, and family engagement across her beauty and wellness routines.
